ai-tha-ap98:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
ai-tha-ap98:3.1_0: Awakened as a fully awakened Buddha,
ai-tha-ap98:3.2_0: seeing the world and the world.
ai-tha-ap98:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap98:4.4_0: I’ve been born in the awakening.
ai-tha-ap98:5.1_0: Impressed in the heaven of the Three and Thirty,
ai-tha-ap98:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap98:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nakula’s mother.
ai-tha-ap98:8.1_0: The sixth garden with senior monks.
